reporting-org.narrative: Ministry for Foreign Affairs of Finland

title.narrative: F.a: Strengthening Sustainable Agriculture Support Service Towards Livelihood Promotion of the Traditional Communities

description.narrative: The most important goal of the project is to strengthen the activities and equip the small and marginal farmers, landless farm workers and established Organic Eco Environment Farms Pvt. Ltd., with agricultural support services towards food sovereignty in t he target area of REAL LEISA Network. Project activities are: Documentation and Publication of Best Organic Farming Practices Among Farmers, Conducing minor field trials for technology dissemination (60 acres) on suitable crops, varieties and other organic farming techniques and how to do organic and sustainable agriculture under changing climatic conditions, Pioneering Agro Forestry System of Alternate Land Use Pattern in Lands given to the Landless Agricultural Labourer by the Government, Providing suppor t services in marketing of organic produces and credit facilities, and Capacity building Programme + Campaign and Advocacy.
